channel.title: I need this to be a safezone! Please help!
channel.description:
[img]http://img170.imageshack.us/img170/5585/coordsmz7.png[/img]
[code]public boolean nonWild() { if((absX > 3248 && absX < 3259 && absY > 3417 && absY < 3425) || (absX > 3248 && absX < 3262 && absY > 3430 &&
absY < 3439) || (absX >= 3180 && absX <= 3186 && absY >= 3433 && absY <= 3446) || (absX >= 3205 && absX <=
3222 && absY >= 3417 && absY <= 3438) || (absX >= 3268 && absX <= 3272 && absY >= 3410 && absY <= 3412) ||
(absX >= 2422 && absX <= 2431 && absY >= 3072 && absY <= 3078))(absX > ] && absX <= [X Coords here NE] &&
absY >= [Y Coords here SW] && absY <=[Y Coords here NE] ) || (absX > 2752 && absX < 2764 && absY > 3493 &&
absY < 3504 ) ||
return true; else return false; }[/code]
Delete all the others. I just want those coords to be safezone.
Please post it done :D
